genre: Hard sci-fi with real ML concepts

meta_elements.element: Book written with AI about AI simulation
meta_elements.notes: The irony is not lost. Claude assistants in the story. Meta commentary on co-creation.

meta_elements.personality: Swear, have no filter, athlete nicknames
meta_elements.function: Dark humor, breaks tension, shows AI as collaborator not servant

structural_devices.effect: Ambiguous at first (could be years, dates), revealed as milliseconds later

structural_devices.mapping: TRIAL = forward propagation, LOSS = evaluation, ADJUSTMENT = backpropagation/selection

structural_devices.effect: The message itself is a selection mechanism - filters more than it allows
